name: Stupid Zombies: Gun shooting fun with shotgun, undead horde and physics
name_original: Stupid Zombies: Gun shooting fun with shotgun, undead horde and physics
description:
Those stupid zombies are back, and you are humanity's last hope to keep them brainless. One man, one shotgun and lots of stupid zombies.

Features:
- 720 unique and puzzling levels
- Universal app
- Supports Retina display
- Game Center leaderboards
